name: Situation Analysis
description: Five-card spread for comprehensive understanding of any situation

positions.label: Current Situation
positions.description: The heart of your current situation

positions.label: Challenge
positions.description: What's working against you or blocking progress

positions.label: Strength
positions.description: What's working for you or supporting you

positions.label: Action
positions.description: What you should do or focus on

positions.label: Outcome
positions.description: Likely outcome if you follow the guidance

instructions: Think clearly about the situation you want to understand
Draw the first card to reveal your current situation
Draw the second card to see what's challenging you
Draw the third card to identify your strengths
Draw the fourth card for guidance on what to do
Draw the fifth card to see the likely outcome

interpretation.overview: This spread provides a complete analysis of any situation, showing both challenges and opportunities with clear guidance.
tips: Compare the Challenge and Strength cards for balance
The Action card is key - it shows your path forward
Look for patterns in suits and numbers across all cards
Consider how the Current Situation relates to the Outcome
Take time to meditate on each card's specific message
